decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing Niv-Mizzet Reborn as a powerful control tool, alongside a variety of versatile spells and cards to maintain board control and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of Bring to Light allows for flexibility in accessing key spells, while the companion Yorion, Sky Nomad provides additional value through blinking creatures and permanents for continued advantage. The deck aims to dominate the game by out-valuing the opponent and utilizing a mix of removal, ramp, and card advantage to stay ahead in the match.

The deck revolves around creating a combo with Amalia Benavides Aguirre to gain life and trigger abilities that benefit from gaining life. It includes cards like Aetherflux Reservoir, Chord of Calling, Collected Company, and Return to the Ranks to assemble the combo pieces. Additional creatures like Dina, Soul Steeper and Wildgrowth Walker help gain life, while Selfless Savior and Skyclave Apparition provide protection and removal. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed, ensuring the combo can be assembled quickly to overwhelm the opponent.

Fast-paced and aggressive Gruul deck focused on quickly dealing damage to the opponent. Utilizes efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage, alongside burn spells like Play with Fire and Monstrous Rage. The deck also features protective spells like Blossoming Defense to keep key creatures on the board. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds versatility and consistency to the deck. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with quick and powerful attacks.

This deck focuses on quickly casting spells to fill the graveyard with Arclight Phoenixes and utilize synergy with Picklock Prankster and Ledger Shredder to bring them back onto the battlefield. With a mix of card draw, removal, and disruption spells, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and powerful spells. The inclusion of Treasure Cruise and Temporal Trespass allows for late-game card advantage and potential game-ending plays. The deck also has a land base optimized for consistent mana production and flexibility in spell casting.

The deck focuses on using a combination of counterspells, board wipes, and card advantage to control the game and outvalue the opponent. It utilizes planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Narset, Parter of Veils, along with efficient removal spells like Portable Hole and Supreme Verdict. The inclusion of Kaheera, the Orphanguard as a companion adds an additional element to the deck's strategy. The mana base is designed to support the control game plan with utility lands like Field of Ruin and Castle Vantress. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's plans and grind out a win through incremental advantage.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying artifact creatures and buffing them with various spells to deal damage to the opponent as fast as possible. It also utilizes cards that can destroy opposing artifacts and control the board. By leveraging the synergies between artifact creatures and spells like Ensoul Artifact and Shrapnel Blast, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a fast victory. Jegantha, the Wellspring provides additional benefits as a companion, allowing for more flexibility in deck building.

The deck focuses on generating life gain and ramp through creatures like Amalia Benavides Aguirre, Prosperous Innkeeper, and Wildgrowth Walker. This allows for utilizing cards like Chord of Calling and Collected Company to search for combo pieces or key creatures. Return to the Ranks and Voice of Resurgence provide resilience and value, while Aetherflux Reservoir acts as a win condition. Boseiju, Who Endures helps to protect crucial spells, while Skyclave Apparition and Dina, Soul Steeper provide removal options. Overall, the deck aims to assemble its combo pieces efficiently while gaining life and generating value from its creatures.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and powerful removal spells to control the board and quickly defeat the opponent. It also includes cards that provide card advantage and ways to disrupt the opponent's hand. The deck includes key cards like Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord and Thoughtseize to help maintain pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By efficiently deploying threats and dealing with the opponent's threats, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a swift victory.
